mapper.insert: insert into shoppinginfos(custid, cfno, ,cfname, qty, price, image) values(#{custid},seqoid.nextval, , #{cfname}, #{qty},#{price},#{image} )
insert into orders(oid, custid, orderdate, remark) values(seqorders.nextval, #{custid}, sysdate, #{remark})
insert into orderdetails(odid, oid, cfno, qty, remark) values(seqodid.nextval, #{oid}, #{cfno}, #{qty}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update coffees set c_qty = c_qty - #{c_qty} where c_no = #{c_no}
mapper.select: select c.c_no c_no, c.c_name c_name, od.qty, c.c_price, c.c_image from (orders o inner join orderdetails od on o.oid=od.oid) inner join coffees c on od.cfno = c.c_no and o.oid = #{oid}
select max(oid) as maxnum from orders
